abstracts.cdata!:
The project will: (a) expand the
            capacity for training health and family planning manpower
            for a nation-wide service delivery program; (b) help
            reactivate Bangladesh's family planning program by
            providing training and salary support for 3,700 female
            family welfare workers who will deliver maternal and child
            health and family planning services; (c) establish a number
            of pilot schemes for introducing family planning education
            and motivation elements in the development programs of five
            ministries; (d) strengthen the capacity of the mass media to
            deal with population topics; and (e) build up research and
            evaluation activities to provide the knowledge needed for
            future program expansion.
